name: Pre-Commit Test Runner
description: Automatically runs all tests before git commit to ensure code quality
prompt:
Run all tests for the serverless CMS project. This includes:
1. Backend/Lambda tests (pytest)
2. Admin panel tests (npm test)
3. Public website tests (npm test)
4. Infrastructure validation (CDK synth)

Run the comprehensive test suite using ./scripts/run-all-tests.sh and report the results. If all tests pass, confirm that the code is ready to commit. If any tests fail, report which tests failed and suggest fixes.
